name: Mycelia
description:
Friendly Fungus' submission for the Tri-Campus Game Jam!

Play as the Mother Tree spreading a mycorrhiza network through the forest. By sharing resources you may survive the heat of summer.

Controls:

  • Interact - Left Mouse Button
  • Move Camera - WASD, Arrow Keys, NumPad, Mouse Edge Scrolling
  • Camera Zoom - Left Shift/Space, NumPad +/-, Mouse Wheel
  • Dismiss Message - Enter/Return
